subject: College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: After a surprising N.C.A.A. Final Four run, Virginia Commonwealth Coach Shaka Smart’s greatest challenge this season was making his current team forget and focus on a new season.
snippet: After a surprising N.C.A.A. Final Four run, Virginia Commonwealth Coach Shaka Smart’s greatest challenge this season was making his current team forget and focus on a new season.
